channel.title: Aryan?
channel.description:
o.k. I got my no-ip set up and im wondering how to actually start it up so people can go on the server.
Also why arent some of my files under rar in notepad for but some are and I right click on them to look for "open as" or something like that but I dont see it answering this would be very helpful thankyou.

item.title: Aryan?
item.dc:creator: @b-rock b-rock
item.description:
@b-rock wrote:

ok I double click runserver.bat a command window pops up and says “starting testscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594” so idk what to do and what about the cfg files being looked up in notepad because I cant convert them unless i’m doing something wrong[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 02:56:23 PM[/size][hr]wow no help from anyone

Read full topic

ugh. Sorry youve lost me now…

item.title: Aryan?
item.dc:creator: @b-rock b-rock
item.description:
@b-rock wrote:

I cant log onto the server I got the no-ip and have the runserver thing started but it says something about 0.0.0.0 43594 why isnt an ip address there

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan?
item.dc:creator: @r0flm40 r0flm40
item.description:
@r0flm40 wrote:

Well rock. Ill try and take you through what i know… if youve got a server with a source and your ip works etc… then all you really need to do is give out the name of the no-ip or your ip number and the port, also if you have ham you need to give that out so that people can get onto the server.

Read full topic
